description: Try our easy to follow Mummy Pops recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cake pop,Seafood free,Chocolate,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Mummy Pops Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix cake crumbs with frosting. Roll tablespoonfuls of mix into balls and freeze until firm.
Melt white chocolate until smooth. Dip bamboo skewer tips into chocolate and push into cake balls.
Fit a small piping bag with a small plain nozzle and fill with melted white chocolate. Pipe swirls of chocolate onto pops, turning as you go, to resemble bandages.
Before chocolate has set, apply green ‘eyes’ cut from Jelly Babies. Leave to set.
